qas.question: When was a Seismic Risk Analysis published?
Who published the Seismic Risk Analysis?
Who published a Seismic Risk Analysis Study?
In what year did Chen Xuezhong publish an earthquake study?
What strength did he predict the next quake in Sichuan to be?

context: <a0_0>In <a3_0>2002<a3_0/><a0_0/>, Chinese geologist <a1_0><a2_0>Chen Xuezhong<a2_0/><a1_0/> published a Seismic Risk Analysis study in which he came to the conclusion that beginning with 2003, attention should be paid to the possibility of an earthquake with a magnitude of <a4_0>over 7.0<a4_0/> occurring in Sichuan region. He based his study on statistical correlation. That Sichuan is a seismically active area has been discussed for years prior to the quake, though few studies point to a specific date and time.
